entries.original: Updated @-mention file truncation from 100 lines to 2000 lines
Add helper script settings for AWS token refresh: awsAuthRefresh (for foreground operations like aws sso login) and awsCredentialExport (for background operation with STS-like response).
entries.translation: AWS 토큰 갱신을 위한 도우미 스크립트 설정을 추가했습니다: awsAuthRefresh (aws sso login과 같은 전경 작업용) 및 awsCredentialExport (STS와 유사한 응답을 사용하는 배경 작업용).
